participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and reflective, Alex prefers one-on-one interactions and enjoys quiet activities.
participant_1.background: i'm a huge coffee lover. my father was a construction worker. i hate the color pink. i do not drink alcohol. i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and lively, Jessica is the life of the party and loves socializing with friends.
participant_2.background: my favorite movie is mean girls. i help out at the food bank occasionally. i am a party animal. i'm deathly afraid of heights. i own a cat and a dog.
